mapper.insert:
select replace(UUID(),'-','')
insert into store_commodity_type ( ID, NAME, RECORD_SORT, PIC_PATH, CREATE_ID, CREATE_TIME, DELETE_ID, DELETE_TIME, RECORD_STATE ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{recordSort}, #{picPath}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{deleteId}, #{deleteTime}, #{recordState} )

select replace(UUID(),'-','')
insert into store_commodity_type
ID,
NAME,
RECORD_SORT,
PIC_PATH,
CREATE_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
DELETE_ID,
DELETE_TIME,
RECORD_STATE,
values
#{id},
#{name},
#{recordSort},
#{picPath},
#{createId},
#{createTime},
#{deleteId},
#{deleteTime},
#{recordState},
mapper.update: update store_commodity_type set NAME=#{name}, RECORD_SORT=#{recordSort}, PIC_PATH=#{picPath}, CREATE_ID=#{createId}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime}, DELETE_ID=#{deleteId}, DELETE_TIME=#{deleteTime}, RECORD_STATE=#{recordState} where ID=#{id}

update store_commodity_type
NAME=#{name},
RECORD_SORT=#{recordSort},
PIC_PATH=#{picPath},
CREATE_ID=#{createId},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime},
DELETE_ID=#{deleteId},
DELETE_TIME=#{deleteTime},
RECORD_STATE=#{recordState},
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select _tbl.ID id, _tbl.NAME name, _tbl.RECORD_SORT recordSort, _tbl.PIC_PATH picPath, _tbl.CREATE_ID createId, _tbl.CREATE_TIME createTime, _tbl.DELETE_ID deleteId, _tbl.DELETE_TIME deleteTime, _tbl.RECORD_STATE recordState from store_commodity_type _tbl where _tbl.Id=#{id}
